typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		areasqkm16 as double,
		gcc_code16 as string,
		gcc_name16 as string,
		sa1_7dig16 as string,
		sa1_main16 as string,
		sa2_5dig16 as string,
		sa2_main16 as string,
		sa2_name16 as string,
		sa3_code16 as string,
		sa3_name16 as string,
		sa4_code16 as string,
		sa4_name16 as string,
		ste_code16 as string,
		ste_name16 as string,
		type as string,
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as double[][][][])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> melbinner2016
melbinner2016 select(mapColumn(
		areasqkm16,
		gcc_code16,
		gcc_name16,
		sa1_7dig16,
		sa1_main16,
		sa2_5dig16,
		sa2_main16,
		sa2_name16,
		sa3_code16,
		sa3_name16,
		sa4_code16,
		sa4_name16,
		ste_code16,
		ste_name16,
		type,
		geometry
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> suburbgeo
